chapter1.question: During which period did the Inter-testamental Period occur?
How long was the Inter-testamental Period?
What term is used to describe the period between the Old and New Testaments?
When was the canonization of the New Testament concluded?
What event marked the beginning of the New Testament period?
What event marked the end of the New Testament period?
Which ruler was appointed to oversee Palestine in AD 26-36?
Which ruler ordered the death of all the baby boys in Bethlehem after the visit of the wise men?
Who was known as the ruler of Galilee and Perea during Jesus' lifetime?
Who reigned over the southern parts of Palestine between BC 4-AD 6?
Who was responsible for the destruction of the temple in AD 70?
What is the name of the high priest mentioned in connection with Jesus' trial?
Which Jewish group adhered strictly to the Law of Moses and had a great zeal for their religion?
Who was known for their rejection of newer traditions and belief in the Torah?
What is the term used to describe the Jewish group that lived a communal lifestyle near the Dead Sea?
Which group among the Jews was strongly opposed to Roman rule?
Which group among the Jews did not believe in life after death or in angels and spirits?
What were the Essenes known for preserving?
Which geographical region was Jesus primarily active in during his ministry?
In which region did Jesus grow up and live?
Which chapter of Matthew's Gospel records the visit of the wise men from the East?
Which verse in Matthew's Gospel records Herod ordering the death of the baby boys in Bethlehem?
In which chapter of Luke's Gospel is the birth of Jesus mentioned?
What is the term used for the collection of books recognized as authoritative Scripture?
What was the primary language spoken by most Jews during the time of Jesus?

chapter2.question: What is the definition of incarnation?
chapter2.correct: God becoming human flesh

chapter2.question: According to 1 Timothy 3:16, how is the mystery of godliness described?
options: God was manifest in the flesh
chapter2.correct: God was manifest in the flesh

chapter2.question: Who is the ultimate author of the Bible?
chapter2.correct: God

chapter2.question: Which two Bible verses indicate the inspiration of the Scriptures?
chapter2.correct: 2 Peter 1:21 and 2 Timothy 3:16

chapter2.question: How does Apostle John describe the incarnation of Christ in John 1:14?
chapter2.correct: The Word became flesh

chapter2.question: What did Jesus mean when He said, 'I and my Father are one'?
options: They are one in essence and nature
chapter2.correct: They are one in essence and nature

chapter2.question: Who requested Jesus to show them the Father in John 14:8-9?
chapter2.correct: Philip

chapter2.question: What caused the fall of man according to the text?
chapter2.correct: Disobedience to God's command

chapter2.question: Which beings rebelled and were driven from heaven as noted in Isaiah 14:12-15 and Ezekiel 28:11-19?
chapter2.correct: Lucifer and his angels

chapter2.question: How did Lucifer deceive Eve?
options: By using a medium, the serpent
chapter2.correct: By using a medium, the serpent

chapter2.question: What is the ultimate solution to the fallen state of the world?
options: God's plan of redemption through Jesus Christ
chapter2.correct: God's plan of redemption through Jesus Christ

chapter2.question: When was the plan of redemption in place according to Ellen G. White?
chapter2.correct: Before the fall of man

chapter2.question: Why was the incarnation of Christ necessary?
options: To handle the problem of sin
chapter2.correct: To handle the problem of sin

chapter2.question: What role does Jesus play in paying the penalty for sin?
chapter2.correct: He becomes our substitute

chapter2.question: What does Hebrews 4:15 say about Jesus' sinlessness?
options: He was tempted in all points yet without sin
chapter2.correct: He was tempted in all points yet without sin

chapter2.question: What are the specific roles of the Trinity in the plan of redemption?
options: Each has a unique role: God the Father gives, God the Son yields, and God the Holy Spirit impresses
chapter2.correct: Each has a unique role: God the Father gives, God the Son yields, and God the Holy Spirit impresses

chapter2.question: According to John 3:16, what did God the Father give for the redemption of humanity?
chapter2.correct: His only Son

chapter2.question: How did Jesus Christ yield Himself in the plan of redemption according to Philippians 2:6-8?
options: By humbling Himself and becoming obedient unto death
chapter2.correct: By humbling Himself and becoming obedient unto death

chapter2.question: What does the term 'Emmanuel' mean?
chapter2.correct: God with us

chapter2.question: What did God promise in the protoevangelium in Genesis 3:15?
chapter2.correct: The coming of a Savior

chapter2.question: According to John 14:6, what is Jesus' role in accessing the Father?
options: He is one of many ways
He is the only way, truth, and life
He is a teacher of the way
chapter2.correct: He is the only way, truth, and life

chapter2.question: According to Romans 5:8, how does God demonstrate His love for us?
options: By Christ dying for us while we were still sinners
chapter2.correct: By Christ dying for us while we were still sinners

chapter2.question: According to 1 John 2:2, how is Jesus' atoning sacrifice described?
options: As the atonement for the sins of the whole world
chapter2.correct: As the atonement for the sins of the whole world

chapter2.question: What does Ephesians 2:8-9 describe about salvation?
options: As a result of good works
By grace through faith, not from ourselves, it is the gift of God
As a reward for the righteous
As a combination of faith and works
chapter2.correct: By grace through faith, not from ourselves, it is the gift of God

chapter2.question: What does Romans 6:23 say about the wages of sin and the gift of God?
options: The wages of sin is death, but the gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus
The gift of God is temporary
chapter2.correct: The wages of sin is death, but the gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus

chapter3.correct: He was tempted in the wilderness

chapter5.correct: The outpouring of the Holy Spirit
